tasks.redis:start: sh -c 'if [ "$GITHUB_ACTIONS" != "true" ]; then redis-server --save "" --appendonly no --daemonize yes; fi'
tasks.test: deno task redis:start && deno test --allow-net --trace-leaks --coverage --doc --parallel --clean ; deno task redis:stop
tasks.bench: deno task redis:start && deno bench --allow-net --allow-env ; deno task redis:stop
tasks.ok: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno task test
